Key:
*yawn*... School's almost out. Just a little
more to go.
...Huh?
*pant, pant*...
O-Origami? What's the matter?
N-Nothing.
You look a little red. Are you getting sick?
I am fine. It is no big deal.

Are you sure? Shouldn't you go to the nurse's
office?
There is no problem. This is... a mere onset.

Onset? I don't know what you're talking about,
but if that's the case, you should go to the
nurse's office.

School's almost over... I can push through.
I will be fine.
O-Okay, but don't overdo it, okay?

I won't. I would rather be with you during
class.

I see. But if you feel worse during class, then
be sure to let me know, okay?
Got it...

Man, she really does look like she's getting
sick.
The bell just rang. Class is starting.
O-Okay.
(Will she really be okay...?)
*pant*...*pant*... *sigh*...
H-Hey Origami! You sure you're okay?
I am close to my limit...

C-Class just ended, so why don't I walk you
home? Can you stand?
I can. *pant, pant*...
(What's wrong with Origami...?)
*pant, pant*...
O-Origami, do you want to rest somewhere?
I feel about ready to faint...

Hey, are you okay? If you weren't feeling well,
you should've gone to the nurse.
No. The nurse... will not fix me.
What is going on? You look awful.

I'm fine. The students... have almost all gone
home. At last, I can be rid of my onset.

Well, yeah. We're far from school now, so
there aren't many students around. But how
is that supposed to help?
Calm. I will require some of your gym clothes.
Huh? Gym clothes?
Correct. Lend me your gym clothes.

What are you planning to do with my gym
clothes?

(Origami put her hand at the hem of her skirt
and fidgeted, rubbing her thighs together. She
only does that when she has an absurd request.)
I need to sniff your scent.
*cough*...
What is the matter?

Nothing. I thought I was prepared, but you
still threw me for a loop.

I haven't had enough of your scent today.
When I searched through your locker during
my break, I couldn't find your gym clothes.

You went through my locker?! What the hell
were you doing?!
It is my daily routine now.
It is?!
Hence why I felt weak today.
Well, I took them home yesterday to wash.

Then when you are finished washing them, I
need you to hand them over immediately.
Or else I cannot live.
Just what happened to you?!

You have conditioned me through the nights
we have spent together.
I never did that!

With that, it has been decided that I am going
over to your house.

Agh... Well, I don't mind you visiting. You want
my gym clothes, right?
So long as it has your scent, anything will do.
I-Is that how it works?

Yes. So hurry, Shido. I am going through
withdrawals.
Withdrawals... Okay, okay. Fine.
Amazing, Shido. You are a fantastic boyfriend.
R-Right...
(So, I took Origami to my house...)

(After getting home, I immediately changed.
She said she didn't want me in my uniform on our
date. I asked Origami to leave my room, but...)
...*inhale, exhale*...

(I have no idea when she changed, but Origami
wore a new outfit as she entered my room and
began breathing deeply. When did she―)
Origami, what are you doing?

I have been deprived of Shido, so I am taking
deep breaths of his scent in his room.
...I-I don't get it.
(More accurately, I don't get her...)

I feel a bit better now, but I still lack
sufficient quantities of your essence.
So it has to be my gym clothes?
(Origami did a subtle nod.)
I am most accustomed to your gym clothes.
Really...? This is taking it one step too far.
What do you mean?

Um, never mind. I mean, are you seriously
going to sniff my gym clothes in front of me?

Well, in general, women who enjoy sniffing
gym clothes are extremely rare. So it would
be difficult to come up with an answer.
At least you're self-aware...

But I am your girlfriend, Shido. I have the
right to sniff.

I wouldn't call it a right, but I've already
washed and folded my gym clothes. I don't
think there's any scent...
...Shido's hand soap!
I used the washing machine!

But you touched them when you placed them
on the clothing line, and after you folded them.
Well, sure, but is that enough for you?
Fine. Wear them briefly right now.
Excuse me?
I want the freshly-worn scent.
O-Okay...?
Hurry up and wear your gym clothes.
Okay...

(Well, whatever. There's no use in resisting.
The problem is I don't want to waste perfectly
clean gym clothes.)
Hey, Origami. Does it have to be my gym clothes?
What do you mean?
Uh, in other words...
Smell the clothes I'm wearing.
Never mind.

Why can't you smell the clothes I'm wearing
right now? We're alone in my room. You can
even bury your face in my chest.

I never thought such an offer would come from
you.

Hm. Well, I'm still adjusting too. By now,
I've practically given up...
If it'll make you feel better, then go for it.
Shido...
That is more than I could ever wish for, but...
Is something wrong?
It's so sudden. I am confused.

(From demanding to sniff my gym clothes
to being shocked by my offer...)

This isn't too out of the ordinary, right?
We're, um, dating after all.

(I'm shy about it, but it's true. We're an
official couple. We should be able to hug
one another.)
Then I won't hold back.
Sure. Go for it.
Shido...
How's this, Origami?
...Very good.

It's as if I am wrapped in your tender embrace.
So warm.

(Origami's slender body leaned into mine.
She is as smooth as a silk cloth.)
Your hair... is very soft. It smells nice.

Shido, your chest... is so inviting. I want to
stay this way forever.

(Origami sank into my chest. It was a feeling
I could get lost in.)

(But Origami's body was small and delicate.
As though, if I held her too tightly, she would
break.)

(I moved my arms slightly, wrapping them
tenderly around Origami's shoulders.)
Shido...
Origami...

(We called each other by name. For some
reason, despite being so close, we still
longed to be even closer. Yearned, even.)
I wish to keep going like this for a while.
We can. I'm happy to.

(I squeezed her shoulders, pulling Origami
closer into my embrace. There was no space
between us. That is how it felt.)
Shido, I feel a little pain.
I am sorry. Did I hug you too tightly?
Mm... It is fine. I want to stay like this...
Ah...

(We held each other, letting time pass
around us.)

Why don't we stop this, Origami? I mean,
it's a lot to ask me to wear my gym clothes
here.

I see. Then I guess I have no choice but to
propose a new idea.

Okay. That didn't take much convincing.
What's the new idea?
I'll sniff you directly.
What?! Wait, you mea...
I'm doing it.
Whoa. Hey, Origami?!

(Origami got right up next to me. Her soft
face was pressed against my chest.)
H-Hey, Origami...
Ah, this is so comforting. I can feel you Shido.
Wait. I'm not comfortable at all!

(Surprise. Panic. Embarrassment. Excitement.
So many emotions tumbled in my chest.)

(It was like my heartbeat could reach Origami.
I tried to make some space between us, so I
grabbed her shoulder, but―)

(My entire body was enveloped by warmth,
which seeped slowly into my skin.)
Shido, your body... It's so warm.
Y-Yeah... I feel it too.

(Through my thin shirt, our respective body
heats combined.)

(It melted away my nerves. Serenity came
over me.)

(I wanted nothing more than to be taken by
this serenity, so I drew Origami in closer.)
Origami, how's this? Satisfied?
Just a bit longer... I want to stay like this.
O-Okay. Not yet.
I want to stay like this forever.

Well, that I can't do, but a little more
couldn't hurt. Honestly, I like it too.

(We stood in this position for a few more
minutes.)

(Light from the amber sunset peeked in
through my blinds, illuminating our tender
feelings. What a nice moment.)
(Even I wished it could last forever.)

(It was difficult to articulate how I felt to her,
but somehow the moment compelled me.)
(That... I love her.)
...Origami.
(I spoke her name, then...)
*breathe*...
Huh? Origami...?
*inhale, exhale*...
O-Origami?!
It is almost time for me to take in your breath.

Since when was that a thing?! Don't breathe
my second-hand air! I-It's gross...
*exhale*...

Whoa. That's so weird. Don't breathe it onto
me!
*inhale*...
Whoa! Cold!
*exhale*...
WARM!
*inhale*...
STOOOOOOOP!
Satisfied. I got my fix.
O-Origami, geez...
And now, I will survive for today.

Don't make it seem like you would've died
if this didn't happen.

Perhaps it was not that severe, but I need
my daily dose of Shido to restore my health.
Get your Vitamin D somewhere else...
Finally, I can be my usual self.
Jeez...
(Man, right as I was feeling romantic...)
(Oh, well.)

(Origami seemed satisfied. As long as she
was happy, I was happy.)

Let's end it here for today. I'm sure Kotori
will be home any time now.
Thank you, Shido. You saved me.

S-Sure. Next time you're in trouble, let me
know, okay?
Can I look forward to the next time?

Oh, well, I guess... How's this: from now on,
instead of sniffing my gym clothes behind
my back, just ask me first?
I-I can at least... be with you.
Then, I will do so.

Okay. Remember, I'm your boyfriend.
As such, I'll do whatever I can for you.
That makes me happy.
(Unh... I'm so embarrassed.)

(Since then, Origami had stopped going through
my locker to sniff my gym clothes.)
(The following day...)
All right. Time to go home. Hm...?
(There's a bag on my desk. What is this?)
Whoa. There are gym clothes inside!

(It was a set of neatly-folded gym clothes.
On them, I saw the name tag: Tobiichi.)
Origami's clothes. Wait, don't tell me...

(I searched through the bag and found a
letter. Inside, the message read,
Returning the favor.")"

(Returning the favor by giving me gym clothes?
Wait, don't tell me...)

We had gym today. Wait, are these the clothes
she wore earlier...?

What does she expect me to do with these?
Wait, is she telling me to sniff them...?
Sniff them.
Return the bag to Origami's desk.
What the hell, wear 'em.

Come to think of it, Reine-san asked me if I was
sniffing Origami's gym clothes. I wonder if
Origami believed I did.
(Of course. I never did such a thing.)

Is that what Origami wants me to do...?
Does she want me to cross this boundary?

(I reached nervously into the bag, and found
a small shirt.)

(She was wearing this shirt only a few hours
ago.)
(I unfolded it and stared at it.)
This really is a petite size.

(Her shoulder length was so much smaller
than mine.)
(Thinking that, I hugged the gym clothes.)

(All that's left for me is to put my nose to
it.)

(Am I really doing this? Origami's scent.
I wonder what it smells like.)

(I imagined Origami wearing this, and
became excited all of a sudden!)
O-Origami...
(Here I go, Origami... I'm going in!)
Itsuka-kun, what are you doing?
Are those Tobiichi-san's gym clothes...?
Wow. What a creep.
FUAAAAHH! When did you guys get here?!

(The perverted tale of Shido Itsuka was spread
all around school. The next day, everyone gave
me cold stares. It made class a living hell...)

(If Origami hadn't told everyone that she
asked me to sew her name tag, I never
would have lived it down.)
Origami... She's got the wrong idea.

(Come to think of it, Reine-san told Origami
once that I was sniffing her gym clothes...
Does she still think that happened?)
(I'm not that kind of guy.)
I'm going to place this back on Origami's desk.
Shido.
Whoa, Origami?! Where did you come from?!

As usual. From the entrance. I wanted to
observe what you would do with my gym
clothes, so I came to watch.

Close call! If I had gone through with it,
you would've seen it all!
Shido, won't you sniff my gym clothes?
I-I appreciate the gesture.
I see. Got it.

(Origami nodded and agreed, to my surprise.
But my internal alarm was going off.)
Just so I'm clear, what is it you "got"?

Shido, you will no longer be satisfied with
my gym clothes alone.

NO! I knew it! You're totally missing my point!
It's fine, Origami. You don't have to reach
into your shirt. What are you trying to do?!
If you want to go beyond gym clothes...

GET YOUR MIND AWAY FROM SNIFFING!
Seriously. I don't need you to show me
your appreciation!
No. I must insist.

No, seriously. I'm fine. I'm just happy to be
with you, Origami.
Shido. What did you say...

L-Like I said, um, I'm just happy that you're
my girlfriend. I don't need anything.

Got it. I want nothing more than to be with
you, Shido. Having you as a partner makes
me happier more than anything.
Right. Let's go home, Origami.
Okay...
(And so, we went home together.)

Shido, could I go over to your house today
as well? I want... to sniff you.
Really? It never ends with you...

(No one else is around. Okay. Instead of
sniffing them, why don't I wear them?)

If I put them on, Origami would probably be
impressed by the novelty of it.
(First, I need to take my clothes off.)
(Okay, now to try her clothes...)

(Man, they're soft. They're ordinary girl's
clothes, but it's like girls use nicer fabric
softener or something.)
(Okay, here goes...)
Urgh... It's tight. Well, she is petite.
(I think I could still wear it though.)
Agh... It fit. Nice.

(My chest was bulging out of this girl's
shirt. How impure of me. Almost like the
shirt could rip at any moment.)
This is a whole new world...

Whew. This is sort of nice. Okay, now to
try on the shorts...

(I've come this far. Might as well see it
through. I looked at the blue polyester
bottoms...)
(Then...)
Itsuka-kun! What are you doing...?

Don't those...
belong to Tobiichi-san?
*gasp*! Sensei! When did you get here?!

...Itsuka-kun. I-I'm so sorry. I didn't mean
to watch.
No. Tama-chan-sensei!

(This is terrible. I need to chase after her
and explain myself...)
Wait, sensei! You have the wrong idea...

AAAAH! Don't run after me, Itsuka! Not in
those clothes!
Crap! That's right! I'm half naked right now!

(I was wearing Origami's shirt, but I hadn't
put on the shorts yet. I just had boxers and
socks. And now I'm in the hallway...)

I'm sorry, Itsuka-kun! I can't deal with
thaaaaat! I'm sorry! As a teacher, please
understaaaaaand!
(Uh. I understand...)
(Man, this is a nightmare.)

(The next day, Tama-chan looked at me with
fear in her eye. Or was it pity? Either way, it
went on for a while...)

(Talk about the most awkward interaction of
my life...)
